related_questions.question:

A. Do not close the window, please.
B. Close the window, please,
C. The window must be closed

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

Penjelasan:

Selamat Belajar :)

Jawaban:

curlier

Penjelasan:

Comparative (Perbandingan)

Kata kunci perbandingan itu ada di kata "than",yang artinya daripada. Bentuk comparative dari curly adalah curlier (kalau diakhiri dengan y, ganti y dengan i lalu tambah er). Semoga membantu!

related_questions.question:
Binder Note High a    Penguin is aquatic, flightless bird. Most of their species live in cold climates area. They have
adapted to live in cold climates.
Penguins have to keep body temperatures high to remain active. They have thick skin and lots of
fat (blubber) under their skin to keep warm in cold weather.
They also huddle together with their friends to keep warm. Emperor penguins have developed a
social behavior that when it gets cold, they huddle together in groups that may comprise several
thousand penguins.
The dark colored feathers of a penguin's back surface absorb heat from the sun. It also keeps
them to warm up too.
Penguins tightly packed feathers overlap to provide waterproofing and warmth. They coat their
feathers with oil from a gland near the tail to increase impermeability. Waterproofing is critical to
5. From the text we know that...
A. penguin fats help them absorb the heat from sun
B. penguins huddle together during mating season
C. penguins can swim faster by coating their feather with oil
D. penguin fats protect them from cold
E. penguins' beaks are waterproof​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. penguin fats protect them from cold
